div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1853 Charsadda (anc. Peucolaotis), en- (520) virons, Gandhara, Pakistan, 1917 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 97+ AR Strato I and Agathocleia: 5 tetradr. Strato I: 18 tetradr. Heliocles II: 10 tetradr. Archebius: 30 tetradr. Philoxenus: 13 tetradr. Antialcidas: 1 tetradr. Peucolaus: 2 tetradr. Diomedes: 4 tetradr. Amyntas: 2 tetradr. Hermaeus: 10 tetradr. Hermaeus and Calliope: 2 tetradr. Disposition: London 29; Lahore 1 Whitehead, NC 1923, pp. 315 ff., illus.; 1940, p. 108; 1947, pp. 41-2 (for the find place)
